name: QuakeDS modified source
short_description:
This is a small attempt to update the Drunken Coder's QuakeDS code to work with the latest release of DevkitPro and PAlib.

Just doing this while I'm waiting for Simon's fourth release of QuakeDS.
All credit should go to id, and the Drunken Coder team
